description:
This is the seventh lesson in the series Culture: The Bible Applied. In this lesson we will be discussing the controversial issue of abortion. We will explore whether or not this issue is purely political or if it has merit as a moral issue as well. In this lesson we will be discussing many important topics such as:

  • What is the definition of abortion?
  • What is the unborn?
  • What are the definitions of life and human?

Understanding these key topics will help you gain a clear understand about what abortion is. You will also gain a perspective on what the Bible says about this issue. We hope this lesson will inspire you to explore other topics and learn more about how the Bible applies to real life.
title: 407: Do You Know What You're Having?
